com.pilot.jword
Class JWordHighlighter

java.lang.Object

          com.pilot.jword.JWordHighlighter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.text.Highlighter
public class JWordHighlighter
extends javax.swing.text.DefaultHighlighter

Custom highlight for JWordTextPane. Handles selection of disconnected regions (like table cells)
